title: Annex III - High-Risk AI System Use Cases

a.exclusion: AI systems for biometric verification (sole purpose: confirm specific person is who they claim to be)

b.description: AI systems for biometric categorisation according to sensitive or protected attributes/characteristics based on inference

main.description: AI systems used as safety components in management and operation of: critical digital infrastructure, road traffic, or supply of water/gas/heating/electricity

a.description: AI systems to determine access/admission or assign natural persons to educational and vocational training institutions at all levels

b.description: AI systems to evaluate learning outcomes (including when outcomes steer learning process) at all levels

c.description: AI systems to assess appropriate level of education individual will receive/access, in context of educational institutions at all levels

d.description: AI systems for monitoring and detecting prohibited behaviour of students during tests at all levels

4.area_name: Employment, Workers Management, and Access to Self-Employment

a.description: AI systems for recruitment or selection (targeted job ads, analyze/filter applications, evaluate candidates)

b.description: AI systems to make decisions on: work-related relationship terms, promotion/termination, task allocation based on behaviour/traits, monitor/evaluate performance and behaviour

5.area_name: Access to and Enjoyment of Essential Private Services and Public Services and Benefits

a.description: AI systems used by/on behalf of public authorities to evaluate eligibility for essential public assistance benefits/services (including healthcare), grant/reduce/revoke/reclaim such benefits

b.description: AI systems to evaluate creditworthiness or establish credit score
b.exclusion: AI systems for detecting financial fraud

c.description: AI systems for risk assessment and pricing in life and health insurance

d.description: AI systems to evaluate/classify emergency calls OR dispatch/prioritize emergency first response services (police/firefighters/medical aid) OR emergency healthcare patient triage

a.description: AI systems used by/on behalf of law enforcement (or EU institutions supporting them) to assess risk of person becoming victim of criminal offences

b.description: AI systems used by/on behalf of law enforcement as polygraphs or similar tools

c.description: AI systems used by/on behalf of law enforcement to evaluate reliability of evidence in investigation/prosecution

d.description: AI systems for assessing risk of person offending/reoffending (not solely on profiling basis) OR assess personality traits/past criminal behaviour

e.description: AI systems for profiling (per Directive 2016/680 Art 3(4)) in detection/investigation/prosecution of criminal offences

7.area_name: Migration, Asylum, and Border Control Management

a.description: AI systems used by/on behalf of public authorities as polygraphs or similar tools

b.description: AI systems to assess risk (security risk, irregular migration risk, health risk) posed by person intending to enter or has entered Member State territory

c.description: AI systems to assist examination of asylum/visa/residence permit applications and complaints (eligibility assessments, reliability of evidence)

d.description: AI systems for detecting/recognising/identifying natural persons in migration/asylum/border control (excluding travel document verification)

8.area_name: Administration of Justice and Democratic Processes

a.description: AI systems used by/on behalf of judicial authority to assist in researching/interpreting facts and law, applying law to facts, or used similarly in alternative dispute resolution

b.description: AI systems for influencing outcome of election/referendum or voting behaviour
b.exclusion: AI systems where natural persons not directly exposed (e.g., tools for organizing/optimizing political campaigns administratively/logistically)

metadata.article_6_3_opt_out: Provider may conclude system is NOT high-risk if meets Article 6(3) conditions (narrow procedural task, improvement, pattern detection without influence, preparatory task) - BUT profiling ALWAYS high-risk

registration_variations.secure_non_public: W-031d - Secure non-public section (Areas 6, 7, and Area 1 for law enforcement use)
